content:
CS 162 Homework 2, 50 Points
Due: Monday, April 15, 11:55pm

Please submit your written solutions to the problems in PDF format via Gradescope (please refer to details from the TA).

  1. 10 points. Exercise 1.7 parts b, c, d, e, and h on page 84 of Sipser.
  2. 10 points. Exercise 1.17 on page 86 of Sipser. (Use the procedure of Lemma 1.55 for part a.)
  3. 10 points. Exercise 1.18 parts a, b, e, i, and l on page 86 of Sipser.
  4. 10 points. Problem 1.41 on page 89 of Sipser.
  5. 10 points. Problem 1.70 on page 93 of Sipser.
